Initializer# init(device:neuronDescriptor:)

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.13+tvOS 11.0+visionOS 1.0+

```

    device: any MTLDevice,
    neuronDescriptor: MPSNNNeuronDescriptor
)
```
